title: Contract validator throws an error after London hard fork

labels.name: TeamGroot
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Groot Team

body:
### Description
Contract validator throw error after London hard fork

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)
1. Generate `genesis.json` from example: https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/HowTo/Configure/Consensus-Protocols/QBFT/#genesis-file
2. Add London block config
```
{
  "config": {
    "chainid": 1337,
    ...
    "byzantiumBlock": 0,
    "londonBlock": 0,
    ...
```
3. Run node

Hi @rymuff, apologies for the slow response. 
Assuming you are running a [free gas network](https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/HowTo/Configure/FreeGas/), can you please try adding `"baseFeePerGas": "0x0"` at the top level of the genesis file, for example:

```json
{
  "config": {
    ...
    "londonBlock": 0,
    ...
  },
  "baseFeePerGas": "0x0",
  "nonce": "0x0",
  ...
}
 ```
@siladu, Problem solved! Thanks for your help!
